plugins.name: gitlab-mr
plugins.description: GitLab Merge Request integration - list MRs, read comments, post feedback, resolve discussions

plugins.name: gitlab-issues

plugins.name: android-code-review
plugins.description: Senior architect code review - reads branch diff and posts inline comments on merge requests
